title: Ticket #1148: Refactor "report on test and exit" code from test into CondorTest.pm
description:
A lot of tests (*.run) include code that looks exactly like this: 

if( CondorTest::RunTest($testname, $cmd, 0) ) {
    CondorTest::debug("$testname: SUCCESS\n",1);
    exit(0);
} else {
    die "$testname: CondorTest::RunTest() failed\n";
}

Refactor this and include it in RunTest in CondorTest.pm, perhaps calling it RunTestAndExit as a thin wrapper around RunTest.
remarks:
2010-Apr-01 10:48:28 by danb:
This is pretty much addressed by my new CondorTest::EndTest() function, so I am marking this ticket as resolved.
